thread.title: Uzbekistan, Cargill launch $3B scheme to back sustainable energy development : az.vesti.news
thread.title_full: Uzbekistan, Cargill launch $3B scheme to back sustainable energy development : az.vesti.news

author: Trend Az
title: Uzbekistan, Cargill launch $3B scheme to back sustainable energy development : az.vesti.news
text:
|
Uzbekistan has secured up to $3 billion in long-term financing — with a possible increase to $5 billion — under a new strategic agreement with Cargill to boost the country’s energy security and sustainability.
Подробнее читайте на trend.az ...
